snippet.title: Skygard Arena - Alpha Trailer
snippet.description:
Meet✨Skygard Arena✨: a modern turn-based tactical RPG, with both PvE and PvP modes!

🐼 Pick 5 heroes between many!
🛡️ Customize them to build the best team!
⚔️ Fight in intense tactical battles!
🐱 Discover the world of Skygard and its various factions!

To join our Alpha Playtest between July 5th and July 16th, head to our Steam page! ➡️ https://store.steampowered.com/app/2148970/Skygard_Arena/
